name: Sock Puppets
appendix:
You probably have some old socks lying around. Don't 
throw them away, make the most beautiful sock puppet with the family.

name: Perfect a Pizza
appendix:
Pick a day of the week. This day, is pizza day. 
It is your mission to find the perfect recipe for you.

name: Write Thoughts
appendix: It may be a diary or a notebook, either way it's a good habbit.

name: Make Your Own Sauce
appendix:
Making your own ketchup is a super rewarding experience.
BBQ-Sauce too!

name: Breathing Exercises
appendix:
Buy a straw and breathe through it. It gives you
a calm heart rate. These exercises really have 
an effect.

name: Museum Virtual Tour
appendix:
You can visit some of the best collections in the 
world online, such as the Louvre Museum. Google it!

name: No Purchases
appendix: You're allowed to prepare for this one. Force yourself to plan ahead and don't buy anything for a full week.

name: Yoga
appendix: It's easy to get started with and could be a great stress relief. Try it.

name: Meditate
appendix:
You've probably told yourself you should.
Give it a chance this month!

name: Use the Oven
appendix: Let's use that thing! Learn new recipes for that oven!

name: Pick Up a Ukelele
appendix:
It tends to be one of the cheapest, but also easiest to 
learn musical instruments out there.

name: Fresh Pasta
appendix: Learn to make fresh pasta. Hard work. But rewarding!

name: Participate in a Photoshop Battle
appendix:
On reddit there's a competition that's often humerous.
Also a great excuse to learn.

name: Rube Goldberg
appendix: Construct your own Rube-Goldberg machine.

name: Repair Clothes
appendix: Learn to make small repairs to clothes. It saves money and it might save your favorite t-shirt.

name: Magic Cards Tricks
appendix:
There's a lot of cool card tricks to learn. 
Just don't overdo the party tricks.

name: Spring Cleaning
appendix: Let's be honest, it might be overdue. It is super rewarding to be in a clean house though!

name: Make a Mashup
appendix:
If you have a Mac, you have garageband. Heard two songs that'd 
sound good together? You're the DJ.

name: Train for a Running Competition
appendix: There's the Santa Run. But also the Utrecht one.

name: New Hair
appendix: Mix it up! Suprise yourself and tell the barber to give you a new style.

name: Pancake Art
appendix: Doodle a face and then eat it. Combine creativity with food. Cool for kids too.

name: Learn to Say Thanks
appendix:
... in 50 languages! You'll always have a 
happy waiter where-ever you'll go.

name: Bounce the Ball
appendix: You've seen the youtube videos with long chains of ping-pong balls bouncing. Set your own record!

name: Learn a Language
appendix: The basics are fine! It may also make a holiday much more enjoyable.

name: No Plastic
appendix: Don't buy anything this month if it will cause plastic waste.

name: Paint on a Canvas
appendix:
Unleash your inner Picasso (or maybe you are more like van Gogh?),
and paint the world's (or your kitchen's) next masterpiece.

name: Awesome Omelet
appendix:
There's a lot of ways to cook an egg. 
Spend some time perfecting a recipe for you.

name: World Digital Library
appendix: Google it! You can search 19,147 items about 193 countries between 8000 BCE and 2000.

name: Learn to Draw
appendix:
Watch a few youtube videos. Try, try, and try again. 
Try drawing the same thing in different styles!

name: Contribute to Open Source
appendix: You can start by adding an idea to this repository!

name: Trade Clothes
appendix: Help eachother to new clothing without spending a dime. Make it last!

name: Try Knitting
appendix: It's relaxing and it gives you clothing! Scarves are easy to start with, but warm socks are amazing too!

name: Survive as a Vegetarian
appendix: Do it for a full month! It really forces you to learn to cook with spices.

name: New Tricks
appendix:
Teach your pet new tricks this month! You might even
try to teach your cat a new trick.

name: Five Spices
appendix: Blindfold yourself and pick 5 random spices at the supermarket. Figure out a dish for each.

name: Furniture Socks
appendix:
Try and make socks for chair- and table-legs. It's much 
easier to play with and it adds color to the house.

name: Vegan Week
appendix: Do the proper research and prepare for a vegan week. Challenge your cooking!

name: Pomodoro
appendix: Give the pomodoro way of working a try.

name: Measure Electricity
appendix:
Measure and defeat the energy vampires. 
Save some money too.

name: Money Jar
appendix: Turn this into a challenge. While keeping it healthy, how long can you last $50 in a supermarket?

name: Start Composting
appendix: If you have a garden you can turn your trash into good soil. Add worms and you'll have less waste!

name: Pickle and Ferment
appendix: Learn how to pickle and ferment. So many great flavours and so many options!

name: Play with Sensors
appendix: Buy a raspberry pi with some sensors and start measuring the world.

name: Quit Social Media
appendix: Even if it is just for a few days. At least remove it from your phone.

name: Banana Pancakes
appendix: Treat yourself every sunday this month! Banana pancakes for the win!

name: Bake Bread
appendix: It can be very rewarding. It'll make your kitchen smell nice too!

name: Volunteer
appendix:
There's a lot of places that appreciate help. 
Volunteer for something you care about.

name: Train Pushups
appendix: How many can you do right now? Can you triple it by the end of the month?

name: Listen to Podcasts
appendix:
Tune down the music and listen to podcasts while you're in 
transit. You might learn something.

name: Lego Challenge
appendix: Buy a box of legos and build it ... without using the instructions manual. Throw it away!

name: Celebrate Boardgames
appendix: Turn the tv off. Monday evenings this month is now boardgame night!
